481-x.pdf:
Number of the law: 481
Date of publication: 8 July 1943
Title of the law in the original language: Vyhláška nejvyššího úřadu cenového ze dne 7. července 1943, čj. 19 934 -1/4-1943, Úřední list č. 157 ze dne 8. července 1943, o tvoření cen sušených hub domácího původu.
Page number: 5174-5177
Summary: The law sets the maximum prices, fees, and rates for the sale of dried mushrooms of domestic origin. It defines the types of mushrooms that fall under this law and categorizes them into four price groups. The law also outlines the maximum fees for collectors, distributors, and retailers, as well as the maximum consumer prices. The law replaces a previous regulation from the Böhmisch-Mährischen Verbandes für die Garten- und Weinbauwirtschaft and applies to both quality classes A and B. Violations of the law are subject to punishment according to government regulations.
13-x-better.pdf:
Number of the law: 13/1941
Date the law was published: 8 January 1941
Title of the law in the original language: Kundmachung, des Ministers für Landwirtschaft vom 8. Jänner 1941, betreffend die Regelung der Erzeugung und Verwertung von Getreide, Hülsenfrüchten, Mahl - und Mehlerzeugnissen, ölhaltigen Früchten, ölhaltigen Samen, Zichorie, Kaffee - Ersatz - stoffen, Heu und Stroh und Futtermitteln sowie der Verwertung von Reis.
Page number of the first page: Not specified.

The law regulates the production and utilization of various agricultural products such as grains, legumes, oilseeds, coffee substitutes, hay, straw, and animal feed. It also covers the utilization of rice. The law defines the different types of products and specifies the regulations for their production and utilization. The law does not apply to the production of feed products governed by other associations.
